Hi Rosemary,

I apologize for the delay.

I've successfully updated the Thermacell website. I'd like to bring to your attention that order notifications for Gecko are sent to sales@geckoinsectkillers.com.au, while notifications for Sectarid & Bug Zapper are directed to onlineorders@mayohardware.com.au.

Could you please confirm if we should proceed with deactivating the order notifications for Gecko, Sectarid, and Bug Zapper?

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia assigned to Rica Rosario Valencia

full_threads.body:
Hello,

Just following up on the below request, copy attached.

For our 4 ecommerce websites (Thermacell, Gecko, Sectarid & BugZapperLamps) the customer order confirmation is also sent to our customer service team.

Our IT have requested that we STOP sending the copy of the order confirmation to our customerservice@mayohardware.com.au email due to the orders now being automatically processed.

Can you please remove this function from each of the websites. If an email address is required, please change to noreply@mayohardware.com.au

Thanks,

Rosemary

Rosemary Murphy

Marketing Communications Manager





rmurphy@mayohardware.com.au



http://www.mayohardware.com.au/



+61 400 329 380



Customer Service: 1300 360 211

We pride ourselves on the highest levels of service delivery, please feel free to contact me on any of the above methods, anytime.

full_threads.body:
Hello,


For our 4 ecommerce websites (Thermacell, Gecko, Sectarid & BugZapperLamps) the customer order confirmation is also sent to our customer service team.


Our IT have requested that we STOP sending the copy of the order confirmation to our customerservice@mayohardware.com.au email due to the orders now being automatically processed.


Can you please remove this function from each of the websites. If an email address is required, please change to noreply@mayohardware.com.au


Thanks,
Rosemary

Rosemary, could you please request WOLFIQ to stop sending a copy of an order confirmation to the CS inbox?

Thanks
Andrew
